participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Friendly and supportive, Jason is someone who values relationships and is determined to provide for his family. He is a bit clumsy but embraces his quirks.
participant_1.background: I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend. I am a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me. I'm a bit of a klutz but I'm comfortable with who I am and I'll do everything I can to give my child a good future. I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends. I'm going to see my brother this weekend to take my mind off my wife.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and outgoing, Emily enjoys expressing herself through art and values her relationships with family and friends. She is eager to embrace new opportunities.
participant_2.background: I need to move because my convertible is not practical for driving to school. While both my parents have thick European accents, I do not. I also love drawing. A hobby of mine is the drums. I have four sisters.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Hey! I'm doing well! I'm getting ready to move into my new place tomorrow.
Oh cool! Where are you moving to?
I'm moving to Salt Lake City, Utah to be with my girlfriend.
Oh wow, that's a big move! What are you most excited about moving there?
I'm excited to be closer to my girlfriend and to start a new chapter in my life.
That's great! I'm sure it will be a lot of fun.
Thanks, I'm hoping it will be!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to draw, play the drums, and hang out with my friends and family.
Oh cool, I love drawing too! What kind of things do you like to draw?
I like to draw cartoons and caricatures. I also like to draw landscapes and cityscapes.
Oh wow, those sound really cool!
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what do you want to do after you move to Salt Lake City?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm hoping to find a job as a graphic designer or an illustrator.
Oh cool, I hope you find a great job!
Thanks!
Well, it was nice talking to you! I hope you have a great time moving tomorrow!
Thanks, you too
